snippet.title: Beholder Complete Edition Coming to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One
snippet.description:
Out Now on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One

https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP4395-CUSA09921_00-BEHOLDER00000EUR

https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/store/p/beholder-complete-edition/bpv4628pq0d0

Take on the role of Carl and decide your own morality scale in Beholder. With procedurally generated scenarios and over 20 different endings to uncover, choose to protect your family through secret machinations or selfless sacrifice. One thing is for sure: Someone is always watching.
